name: nnssz

body.origin:
|- wss(cn, cz)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
-| diffsc(hs0, cn)
-| diffsc(hs0, cz)
body.pretty:
⊢ ℕ ⊆ ℤ
⊣ (hs0 ∈ ℕ → hs0 ∈ ℤ)
⊣ d(hs0, ℕ)
⊣ d(hs0, ℤ)
